description: Kiribayashi Azumi is the head of the Flower Arrangement Club, Azumi is Ryouko`s rival for Tatsuya`s affections. She is skilled with the naginata. It appears she`s slightly older than Ryouko as she is referred as Senpai. It is Azumi who suggests in both the manga and anime that Ryouko train in actual Swordmanship.
name: Kiribayashi Azumi
